title: Calories in Roasted Chicken
meta_description: Learn calories in chicken roasted per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details for easy tracking.
assumptions: Roasted chicken, meat and skin, cooked without added oils or seasonings; standard broiler/fryer.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken cut, size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of roasted chicken provides ~239 kcal and ~27g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100g during roasting
Breast meat only (vs. meat and skin mix)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g roasted chicken?
faqs.a: About 239 kcal for roasted chicken with skin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in roasted chicken per 100g?
How does skin affect calories in chicken roasted?
faqs.a: Skin adds fat; skinless is ~139 kcal per 100g vs. 239 with skin.

faqs.q: What about sodium in roasted chicken?
faqs.a: Around 82mg per 100g, but seasonings can increase it significantly.
